arts.ttl: Kieran Tierney sick during Celtic half time break as returning hero overcomes bug to star in Aberdeen win
arts.sum: Brendan Rodgers revealed in his post-match interview the fans' favourite wanted to stay on despite his Pittodrie illness

arts.ttl: Benjamin Nygren delivers a Celtic masterclass as Aberdeen swept aside to continue perfect start – 5 talking points
arts.sum: Celtic cruised to victory to make it two wins from two to start their Premiership title defence

arts.ttl: Celtic continue perfect start with win at Aberdeen
arts.sum: Celtic continued their perfect start to the Scottish Premiership season with a 2-0 victory at Aberdeen.
Live updates will appear below after 12:30.

arts.ttl: Aberdeen v Celtic – Team News, match officials and where to watch
arts.sum: Celtic take on Aberdeen at Pittodrie this lunchtime in the first away fixture of the new Scottish Premiership season for Brendan Rodgers and his team. Celtic ran out emphatic 5-1 winners in the post split visit to Pittodrie back in May but Just over a week later Jimmy Thelin’s side shocked the Hoops and denied Read More

arts.ttl: Aberdeen v Celtic: team news, referee details, KO details & where to watch
arts.sum: Celtic face Aberdeen at Pittodrie in the first away outing of the season. The Scottish Champions travel to the North East to face Aberdeen as they look to exact revenge after the Scottish Cup Final in May. Brendan Rodgers will want his side to make it two wins from two but they’ll know that it Read More

arts.ttl: Aberdeen v Celtic Match Preview – Champions to edge tight encounter
arts.sum: It’s fair to say Celtic underwhelmed slightly in their first league game against St Mirren. That makes the thought of a trip to Pittodrie – particularly with Brendan Rodgers left short of attacking options – a little less comfortable than usual. The side they face on Sunday, Aberdeen, caused problems in last season’s Scottish Cup Read More

CELTIC beat Aberdeen three times and drew once in their four Premiership meetings last season while scoring 13 goals and conceding four. Brendan Rodgers’ side had a 100 per cent record at Pittodrie, the venue for the 12.30pm kick-off today, winning 1-0 in December and 5-1 in May. How much can you remember about past associations with [...]

arts.ttl: Brendan Rodgers benches £20m of Celtic talent as veteran makes return in predicted XI vs Aberdeen
arts.sum: The Hoops spent record sums last year but Rodgers has yet to be bankrolled with any significant kitty this summer

arts.ttl: Aberdeen vs Celtic predictions: Bhoys set for cup final revenge
arts.sum: Aberdeen beat Celtic in last season's Scottish Cup final but Tom McGarry expects the Bhoys to gain revenge when they meet at Pittodrie in the Scottish Premiership on Sunday.
